timeline.message: Fixed onBackPressed bug (inactive button) + Refactored and optimized the code
Added translations to prepare pre-search + Fixed fab bug
Cleaned a bit the code + Fixed cross display bug

timeline.bodyText: will be overridden by the bot, rather set a placeholder and replace it via code (that way the translations will come in and it'll work for your fork too!

timeline.message:
Removed translations (unneeded for this fix branch)

This reverts commit 938e4a6f44f0af34892a1127d5eeb8bedd895746.

Signed-off-by: Kilian Périsset <kilian.perisset@infomaniak.com>

Formated the code of ExtendedListFragment.java

(In order to avoid issues)

timeline.bodyText:
both are not needed to be public, according to AndroidStudio.
searchView can remain protected and closeButton even private
timeline.author: tobiasKaminsky
